home.name: Muid Hasan Maruf
home.title: Full Stack Developer | Laravel | Web Security Enthusiast
home.tagline: Building secure and scalable web applications.
home.bio: I am a passionate software developer with a strong interest in Web technology. I am currently a CSE student, and I love to learn new technologies and apply them to solve real-world problems. I am actively looking for opportunities to contribute to open-source projects and collaborate with other developers.

about.background: I am a final year Computer Science and Engineering student at Green University of Bangladesh. My academic journey has provided me with a strong foundation in software development, algorithms, and data structures. I have a keen interest in web development and cybersecurity, and I am always eager to learn more about these fields.
about.goals: My goal is to become a proficient full-stack developer with a specialization in cybersecurity. I want to build secure, scalable, and user-friendly web applications that make a positive impact on people's lives. I am also interested in exploring the field of ethical hacking and penetration testing.

projects.title: RappidCart – Java Swing + MySQL E-commerce App
features: Product catalog with search and filtering
projects.problem: This project was developed to provide a simple and intuitive desktop application for managing an e-commerce store. It solves the problem of keeping track of products, customers, and orders in a centralized system.

projects.title: Hotel Management System – University Project
projects.problem: This project was developed as part of a university course to create a web-based application for managing hotel operations. It helps to streamline the process of managing rooms, guests, and payments.

projects.title: Smart Home Automation IoT Project
features: Control lights, fans, and other appliances remotely
projects.problem: This project was developed to create a smart home automation system that is affordable and easy to use. It allows users to control their home appliances from anywhere in the world using a web or mobile application.

projects.title: AeroLink Network Matrix – Cisco Simulation
features: Designed and configured a complex network topology
Implemented routing protocols such as OSPF and EIGRP
Configured VLANs, ACLs, and other security features
Tested and verified network connectivity and performance
projects.problem: This project was developed to simulate a real-world enterprise network using Cisco Packet Tracer. It helped me to gain hands-on experience in designing, configuring, and troubleshooting complex networks.

projects.title: Encrypted File Transfer System – Cybersecurity Project
features: Encrypt and decrypt files using AES and RSA algorithms
Securely transfer files over a network
projects.problem: This project was developed to create a secure file transfer system that protects data from unauthorized access. It uses strong encryption algorithms to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of files during transmission.

contact.closing_note: I enjoy learning new technologies and building real-world solutions. Let’s connect!
